snippet: It’s clearer now that “Gravity,” “12 Years a Slave” and “American Hustle” lead the race for best picture. Perhaps the Directors Guild Awards next weekend will narrow the options.
abstract: It’s clearer now that “Gravity,” “12 Years a Slave” and “American Hustle” lead the race for best picture. Perhaps the Directors Guild Awards next weekend will narrow the options.

headline.main: What Does the Producers' Tie Mean for the Season?
